title: Marketing and Development Intern - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Marketing and Development Intern This internship is specifically geared towards the individual with an interest in marketing and development.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
